body.text:
🙏 नमस्कार, {{startcase(get(split(1.contacts[].profile.name; space); 1))}} जी ! Welcome to Jhansi Empire

🔥 Explore The Royal Lifestyle experience with World Class AMENITIES:
✅ 3 Tier Security
✅ Shopping Complex
✅ Swimming Pool
✅ Electricity Backup For Common Areas
✅ 24x7 Water Supply
✅ Sufficient Parking
✅ Exclusive Design
✅ Kids Play Zone
✅ Yoga Meditation Zone
✅ Temple
✅ Pinned At Premium Land
✅ Fire Safety Equipment Installation

🔥 JDA APPROVED | RERA : UPRERAPRJ657125

🔥 Price ₹64.75 Lakh onward

✔️ TYPES : 3BHK | 3BHK+S | 4BHK+S
✔️ SIZES : 1850 sq.ft. | 1920 sq.ft. | 2050 sq.ft. | 2880 sq.ft.
✔️ PROJECT APPROVED BY : SBI | Bank of Baroda

📌 Gwalior-Shivpuri Bypass Near Lahargird Police Chowki, Jhansi (UP)

📞 Call : https://pariflex1.github.io/call/7080677714
